entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
